description:
The Doubles Championship heats up as Eve and Aoi face off against the best high-school players in Japan. Can they take their first step towards worldwide fame and glory?
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: I Think Who Gets What Room Is Very Important for Girls
Joshi no Heyawaritte Kekkou Daiji na Koto Da to Omou no
女子の部屋割りって結構大事なことだと思うの
